title: Hour 2: An Emotional Attachment To Skittles
description:
Billy asks a GoJo question to the Shipping Container: if you were to quit eating candy tomorrow, what would your last candy be? Then, we got to Stugotz's Weekend Observations and the Funniest Thing From the Sports Weekend.
